body:
I like the proposal (although [Merovius@ proposal](https://play.golang.org/p/5f2opns9yk) is very good, too---I'm definitely going to use it myself), however I've one objection has kind of already been touched on: how do defend this proposal if future similar proposals are rejected?

For better or worse, a fair amount of gophers want min/max/abs/etc functions and I could see future proposals using this as their defense for adding a math.Min(interface{}, interface{}) function.
